channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Planning Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Planning Analytics

item.title: CVE-2022-22339|2024-09-17T01:00:45.906Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 219736.

item.title: CVE-2021-38873|2024-09-17T02:06:20.830Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is potentially vulnerable to CSV Injection. A remote attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of csv file contents. IBM X-Force ID: 208396.

item.title: CVE-2021-20477|2024-09-17T01:47:06.915Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 196949.
